definition: to be on the regular payroll/to be on the permanent staff
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

sentences.english: On the People’s Daily website, Miao manages to come off as a staff reporter for the CCP’s top daily.
sentences.chinese: 在人民網上，苗一舉成爲這家“黨報”的在編記者。

sentences.english: EG: The correspondence were all put away in bulked files.
sentences.chinese: 信件都分別放在編了號的文檔夾裏。

sentences.english: The correspondence was all put away in numbered files.
sentences.chinese: 存放在編了號的卷宗內。

sentences.english: He worked on the dictionary until he was very old.
sentences.chinese: 一直到很大年齡他還在編篡這部詞典。

sentences.english: Huck was silent while he framed a duly cautious reply.
sentences.chinese: 哈克沒有做聲，心裏卻在編出一個相當小心的回答。

sentences.english: Mr. Wu has no teaching tasks this term, and he compiles the teaching materials.
sentences.chinese: 吳老師本學期沒有課，他在編教材。

sentences.english: EG: The correspondence was all put away in numbered files.
sentences.chinese: 信件都分別放在編了號的文件夾裏。

sentences.english: Teacher Wu haven't lessons this term, he is writing textbooks.
sentences.chinese: 吳老師本學期沒有課，他在編教材。

sentences.english: Like you are just making things up and lying to yourself.
sentences.chinese: 就像你只不過是在編故事，自欺欺人而已。

sentences.english: I'm not lying, I just made the story.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有說謊，我只是在編故事。
